Title: Relates to persons designated as auxiliary officers
Summary: Relates to persons designated as auxiliary officers; provides certain powers to auxiliary officers; imposes training requirements.
LawCode: Amd §835, Exec L; add Part 1 Title A Art 3 §§3.10 - 3.30, CP L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law and the criminal procedure law, in relation to persons designated as auxiliary officers
